DOC.criteria: 6 10 year old Myopia : 0.50 D 4.00 D eye Astigmatism : < 1.50 D ; ≤ 1.25 D withtherule astigmatism ( axes 180 ± 30 ) ; ≤ 0.50 D astigmatism ax eye Anisometropia : ≤ 1.50 D Symmetrical corneal topography corneal toricity < 2.00 D eye Agree randomization Contraindications orthokeratology wear ( e.g . limbustolimbus corneal cylinder dislocate corneal apex ) Any type strabismus amblyopia Myopic treatment ( e.g . refractive surgery progressive lens wear myopic control ) study period Rigid contact lens ( include orthokeratology lens ) experience Systemic condition might affect refractive development ( example , Down syndrome , Marfan 's syndrome ) Ocular condition might affect refractive error ( example , cataract , ptosis ) Poor compliance lens wear followup
